name: coleus
content:
Add to word list

a plant commonly grown in gardens or in a container inside a house, for its colourful red, pink, white, and yellow leaves: Coleus grows fast to fill in holes and does equally well in sun or in shade. He decided to plant containers with brightly-coloured coleus instead of geraniums. Coleuses can be propagated easily and grown quickly.
More examplesFewer examplesThe colourful leaves of coleus are ideal for padding out the planting.Multicoloured coleus will create a sense of the exotic.Brightly coloured leafy coleus and dahlias can be used as summer bedding alongside late-summer perennials.
